original_title: Primitivismo Kanibaru na Lama da Tecnologia Catódica
overview: In the future, metanoia erupts from the filth of the world. The monstrous primate that roars out of the mud, imposes itself before the erratic and alienated human being, molding its violence against the cathodic domain.
title: Primitivismo Kanibaru na Lama da Tecnologia Catódica
